item.description: Take a scenic drive through some of the most densely populated shopping areas in the greater Hartford area on Black Friday. Decorate your Car, Van, Bus or Armored personel carrier with Ron Paul for President signs and follow the leader on a pre-determined 1-2 hour route on Connecticuts finest pot holed roadways. After, we will meetup at the Adams Mill or other drinking establishment to decide who wins the best decorated mobile campaign buggy. First prize wins an all expense paid trip home via taxi if required. Ha. Short notice but all that is required is an enthusiastic group hell bent on restoring the republic. First Shift: 10:00 AM Second Shift and Meetup at 2:00 PM at the Commuter parking lot at the corner of Buckland ST and Pleasant Valley Rd  (Next to the Mobil Station) We will following the "Night Rider" into the sunset.
item.name: Black Friday - Ron Paul Caravan
